channel.title: Highest solo level?
channel.description:
On WaW Zombies. Mine's 32 for Der Riese. For the people who think I BS, I took a picture >.>
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2pt15yh.jpg[/img]
If your going to post, please post proof that you made it to that level, I dont want to hear "I made it to level 50 but i haz no proof"

item.title: Highest solo level?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNk5UZPnUYo

ISO modding is very fun, especially when you’re in a gangbang with 100 undead Nazis.

Read full topic

item.title: Highest solo level?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:27, topic:375165”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=471128.msg3451773#msg3451773 date=1293796559]

Level 132 solo on der riese, then I got bored and gave up.
[size=1]WaW zombie iso mods are the greatest ever.[/size]

Tis even greater if you play on PC, easy as anything to mod.
[/quote]
WaW zombies & campaign (both single player & co-op) are easy as hell to mod on the xbox too :)[/quote]
Not if you have bad internet and can’t download the iso to mod with
My bro’s been trying for weeks, tried hotswapping and all.

[quote=“riku9182, post:29, topic:375165”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=471128.msg3451773#msg3451773 date=1293796559]

Level 132 solo on der riese, then I got bored and gave up.
[size=1]WaW zombie iso mods are the greatest ever.[/size]

Tis even greater if you play on PC, easy as anything to mod.
[/quote]
I’ve got WaW for computer. But my computer is shit and it lag’s like hell :l[/quote]
Damnnn, I play on my laptop on max graphics settings man.
I’ll have to take a few screenies of my custom maps I have, got over 10, some of them on islands and beaches, zombies come out of the water, it’s pretty awesome.

Read full topic

U so pro boiii.

item.title: Highest solo level?
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:19, topic:375165”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=471128.msg3445598#msg3445598 date=1293410972]

Does anyone here play on PC? I’ve spent most of today playing custom zombie maps

I want to start, but my Laptops crap and I probably won’t be able to play.

Is there any specifications for playing for games? I only have 1GB RAM, 2.00GHZ

That means nothing, what processor? Not just the clock speed.
And what graphics card?

If you have an integrated graphics card then it’s a big no no.
I play on my laptop, but it cost me £900 so it’s got dedicated graphics.

Don’t trust him, He’s not reliable
He left us on round 3 and we died on round 4
[/quote]

Yeh, it was 4am in the morning.

For you it was like 4PM.[/quote]
Convienent we lost on round 4 and it was 4am?
I think it was a SETUP!

Read full topic
